summary: Website/admin panel project with (1) a request to replace the header and footer logo on every page with a single uploaded image, and (2) a request to hide the header only on the admin panel.

existing_features.title: Update the shared public Layout so the global site header is not rendered on admin panel routes (any path that starts with "/admin-panel"), while keeping the header visible on all other routes (including public pages and "/admin" login).

new_feature_requests.summary: Replace header and footer logos on every page with the uploaded logo image (site-wide).
Hide the header only on the admin panel (do not affect the main website).
